select b.id as id, c.name as name, b.photo as photo, e.name as courseName, g.grade as grade, b.create_time as createTime from
fc_exam_signup_user a inner join
fc_certificate_archives b on a.role_id = b.role_id and (a.role_type-1) = b.role_type inner join
fc_certificate_attestation c on b.cert_id = c.id inner join
fc_exam_signup d on c.id = d.cert_id and b.exam_signup_id = d.id inner join
fc_course_archives e on d.course_id = e.id inner join
fc_exam_signup_area f on f.id = a.area_id and b.exam_signup_area_id = f.id inner join
fc_exam_record g on a.id = g.signup_user_id and f.id = g.exam_signup_area_id and d.id = g.exam_signup_id where a.role_id = #{roleId} and a.role_type = #{roleType}
limit #{page} , #{limit}
